response.original_title: Gigi, God's Little Princess: God's Princesses Can Always Trust the King
response.overview: Gigi knows that inside her heart she is a princess, so for her birthday she expects her parents to get her the Princess Pinky Starr Castle. But when they don't get it for her, she is disappointed until her trusty loyal servant (and cat) Lord Fluffy helps her to realize that the King's plan is the best plan—even if it's not what Gigi's plan would be—because God always knows what is best for her.
response.title: Gigi, God's Little Princess: God's Princesses Can Always Trust the King
